description: Home-made curry paste adds a delicious fragrance and warmth to the curry.
name: Thai Red Curry With Snapper Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Add the snapper, return to a boil, then reduce the heat and simmer for 56 minutes or until the fish is just cooked; it will be white and beginning to flake. Sprinkle over the coriander and serve with steamed rice.
